property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcInputDatabaseDriver
property.description: Specify Jdbc database driver for input database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcInputDatabaseUrl
property.description: Specify Jdbc database URL driver for input database. E.g: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/testdb

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcInputStoreUsername
property.description: Specify Jdbc store username for input database. E.g: postgres

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcInputStorePassword
property.description: Specify Jdbc store password for input database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcInputTableName
property.description: Specify Jdbc input table name for input database. E.g: test_event_input_table

property.name: apex.app-param.whereCondition
property.description: Specify WHERE clause for input database. Note if blank value specified, all records would be selected

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputDatabaseDriver
property.description: Specify Jdbc database driver for output database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputDatabaseUrl
property.description: Specify Jdbc database URL driver for output database. E.g: jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/testdb

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputStoreUsername
property.description: Specify Jdbc store username for output database. E.g: postgres

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputStorePassword
property.description: Specify Jdbc store password for output database.

property.name: apex.app-param.jdbcOutputTableName
property.description: Specify Jdbc output table name for output database. E.g: test_event_output_table

property.name: apex.app-param.numberOfPartitionRequired
property.description: Specify the partition count for Jdbc Input for static partitioning.

property.name: apex.app-param.batchSizeForJdbcInput
property.description: Specify the batch size for Jdbc Input.

property.name: apex.app-param.uniqueKeyForRangeQueries
property.description: Specify the unique key for range queries for Jdbc Input.

property.name: apex.app-param.columnsExpressions
property.description: Specify the column expressions for Jdbc Input.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForJdbcInput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for jdbc input.

property.name: apex.app-param.pollIntervalForJdbcInput
property.description: Specify the poll interval for Jdbc input.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForJdbcOutput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for jdbc output.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForTransformInput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for transform input.

property.name: apex.app-param.tupleClassNameForTransformOutput
property.description: Specify tuple class name for transform output.
